0.1.name: wordpress/wordpress-forms
0.1.description:
IMPORTANT NOTE: This is a Beta version of this plugin. You should NOT use it in production instances. Future releases will demand stable releases. Stay in touch!

One of the barriers that users of Wordpress have to face is the creation of custom Web forms. Many plugins exist but they are always either too difficult for the end-user or too inflexible. This plugin redesigns this concept: a fast and intuitive creation of both basic or professional custom forms that are effective and only requires from the user a mouse and their imagination!

With the power of the newly created Custom Post Types You Will Be Able to:

  • Quickly create forms with a single click by selecting the elements you want.
  • Modify the advanced options for each field.
  • Specify an email which will be sent the submissions to the forms or
  • Specify an external location in order to process the submitted data.
  • Embed forms
